value:
I won't stop at captain. I will keep
on climbing!

I'm a loyal warrior of Nohr, mighty
and cunning in equal measure.

The weak only hold back the strong.
Best to get rid of 'em before they
give you trouble.

I'll be a king someday. I'll make it
happen—you wait and see.

I'm itching for a fight. Maybe I'll go
pick one to amuse myself...

Out of the way—I'm here to crush a
rebellion. Oh...there's no uprising?
Fine. Blame $Nf.

Bow down! That's right! Bow down
before me! I'll slaughter anyone!
Ah ha ha! Die, scumbags!
What?!

Let me show you how I got my
promotion. HAAAH!

I'm Hans, Nohr's newest captain.
Who wants an axe to the neck?

You've seen a lot of battle, huh? I can
practically smell the blood on you.
I respect that.$k$pChaos will always topple the ones
who don't earn their status. It's folks
like you and me who rise to the top.$k$pAnd the way we do that is by cutting
down all our enemies. Gahaha! Don't
act like you don't know what I mean!$k$pNo matter how orderly things look,
chaos is always ready to bubble up
to the surface...with a little help.$k$pEven a kingdom like this one could be
in the hands of people like us before
you know it. Just follow my lead!
Gah, die!
Kill 'em all!
I'll break your face!
Bow to my might!
Defeated?
I'm Hans, Nohr's newest captain. Who wants an axe to the neck?
Try that again and you'll be sorry.
I'll be a king someday. I'll make it happen—you wait and see.
Don't even think about defying King Garon.
Corrin's here too? Ugh, I can't stand that soft-hearted weakling...
I won't stop at captain. I will keep on climbing!
I'm gonna use you to get ahead. You better work real hard.
Fine.
Hurry it up!
As good as dead.
